Stat.Name: Smarts
Stat.Description: This jelly in my braincase isn't here for nothing.

Stat.Name: Savvy
Stat.Description: Sometimes, it's not WHAT you know but how you apply it.

Stat.Name: Dazzle
Stat.Description: Eh, pick your jaw up off the floor.

Stat.Name: Kismet
Stat.Description: Just because I keep winning doesn't mean I cheat!
